title: FIFA World Cup Blockchain Ticketing Platform Raises Swiss Regulatory Scrutiny: Report
contentSnippet: Swiss gambling authority Gespa is reportedly probing whether or not FIFA's right-to-buy collectibles comply with local gambling laws.

title: What to expect as the US government shutdown enters week two
contentSnippet: The shutdown entered its sixth day on Monday, with the SEC, CFTC and other agencies operating with restrictions and limited staff.

title: Plume Network gains SEC transfer agent status to bring TradFi onchain
contentSnippet: Plume’s SEC registration lets it manage tokenized securities under US law, a step toward merging traditional markets with blockchain infrastructure.

title: New Rules, Better Tools: How Crypto Is Maturing Through Privacy and Regulation
contentSnippet: From enterprise privacy to stablecoin design, builders at Token2049 say crypto is becoming defined by structure, compliance, and trust.

title: 3 Bitcoin charts bulls are watching after BTC’s weekly all-time high close
contentSnippet: A record weekly close above $123,000 for Bitcoin confirms a new phase of price discovery as onchain and futures metrics point to bulls running the show.

title: ‘The Future is Embedding Myriad as a Protocol’: Co-Founder
contentSnippet: Myriad brought its vision for the future of prediction markets to the Predictify Everything symposium at Token2049.

title: Crypto Lender Figure Shares Jump 6% After Bernstein Raises Price Target
contentSnippet: Analysts at investment firm Bernstein are forecasting a more than 30% increase from the Monday opening price of Figure Technologies .

title: Stellar Lumens Breaks Resistance as Traders Drive 3% Rally
contentSnippet: XLM climbed from $0.40 to $0.41 over a 23-hour period as corporate trading volumes tripled, signaling renewed institutional appetite for blockchain-based payment networks.

title: HBAR Advances 3% in Robust Recovery Rally Amid Market Volatility
contentSnippet: Hedera’s native token climbed 3% over the past 24 hours, breaking key resistance levels and sustaining momentum on surging volume

title: Grayscale Ethereum ETFs Are First in US to Add Staking
contentSnippet: Grayscale's new feature eliminates a major pain point for Ethereum ETFs: the absence of staking rewards for institutional investors.

title: Why Saylor’s Strategy keeps buying Bitcoin: The long-term bet, explained
contentSnippet: Michael Saylor’s $73-billion Bitcoin bet: Inside Strategy’s playbook, bold $1-million thesis and the risks that could shape corporate finance.

title: How Pump.fun captured 80% of Solana memecoins, and can it last?
contentSnippet: How Pump.fun’s one-click minting, bonding-curve graduation and locked liquidity drove Solana’s memecoin dominance: the risks and metrics to watch next.

title: PEPE Outpaces Memecoin Market as Whales Continue Accumulating
contentSnippet: The price jump comes amid growing whale accumulation, with top 100 PEPE addresses on Ethereum adding 4.28% to their holdings in 30 days.

title: Filecoin Rises 2% After Breaking Through Resistance at $2.37
contentSnippet: The token has support at the $2.31 level.

title: Vietnam Caps Crypto Pilot at Five Licensed Exchanges
contentSnippet: Experts warn Vietnam’s restrictive entry requirements and limited licensing could push innovation offshore.

title: Can Solana outperform Ether if ETFs get approved?
contentSnippet: How a US SOL ETF could shift access, flows and usage — plus the key metrics to watch to see whether Solana outperforms Ether.

title: Top 5 crypto traders to watch in 2025: From James Wynn to Machi Big Brother
contentSnippet: From bold bets to painful losses, 2025’s top crypto traders show how narratives move markets. Know the risks before jumping in.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana ETFs Surge as Crypto Funds Pull in Record $5.95 Billion
contentSnippet: Bitcoin soared to a new peak price over the weekend following a record week for cryptocurrency ETF investments, with nearly $6 billion worth.

title: EU eyes crypto oversight under ESMA to end fragmented supervision
contentSnippet: ESMA moves to take direct control of crypto oversight under MiCA as EU states clash over cross-border licensing and fragmented market supervision.

title: Bee Maps Raises $32M to Scale Solana-Powered Decentralized Mapping Network
contentSnippet: The fresh capital will be used to distribute more devices, enhance AI models that process and update map features, and boost contributor incentives, Bee said.

title: Strategy Buys No Bitcoin While Making $140 Million in Dividend Payments
contentSnippet: Strategy has made similarly timed pauses this year.

title: PLUME Rises 25% as Network Registered by SEC as Transfer Agent for Tokenized Securities
contentSnippet: Plume is already receiving interest from 40 Act funds and is seeking more licenses.

title: Leap Therapeutics Shares Jump on $59M Winklevoss-Led Crypto Deal
contentSnippet: The penny stock name said the investment will be used to purchase cryptocurrency to be held on the company balance sheet.

title: Bitcoin Options Market Now Big Enough to Move Spot Prices, FalconX Says
contentSnippet: Options flows now shape price direction more than spot trades as institutions lean on Deribit and IBIT to position around volatility.

title: Stablecoins Could Lure $1 Trillion in Deposits Away From Banks: Analysts
contentSnippet: Stablecoins could drain $1 trillion from emerging market banks in three years as depositors prioritize capital preservation over yields, analysts predict.

title: Sanctioned A7A5 becomes largest non-US dollar stablecoin: Data
contentSnippet: Despite sanctions and scrutiny, the ruble-backed A7A5 stablecoin surged 250% in a day to reach a $500 million market cap, overtaking all non-US dollar rivals.

title: Tom Lee's BitMine Boosts Ethereum Treasury Holdings to $13 Billion
contentSnippet: BitMine Immersion Technologies now holds more than three times the Ethereum of SharpLink Gaming, buying another $823 million worth last week.

title: AI/HPC Bitcoin Miners Rally as AMD Soars 30% on OpenAI Deal
contentSnippet: OpenAI’s multi-billion-dollar chip agreement with AMD fuels sector-wide gains across artificial intelligence and high-performance computing stocks.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: BitMine Immersion Added $821M in Ether, Bringing Cash and Crypto Holdings to $13.4B
contentSnippet: The firm extended its lead as the largest ether treasury, holding over 2.83 million in ETH tokens.

title: DAT企業資産が20兆円規模に拡大も懸念浮上、ボラティリティ依存が課題＝VanEckレポート
contentSnippet: VanEckは最新レポートでDAT企業の保有資産が20兆円規模に拡大したと報告した。ブームが継続する中、レポートはボラティリティ依存型のDAT企業の戦略の持続可能性に懸念を表明した。

title: スタンダードチャータード銀、2025年末にビットコイン20万ドル予想を維持
contentSnippet: スタンダード・チャータード銀行が仮想通貨ビットコインの2025年末価格を20万ドルと予想している。ETF流入と米政府閉鎖を上昇要因に挙げた。

title: ビットコイン史上最高値更新、独歩高の背景に強気の投資家態度｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインは5日、史上最高値を更新した。金融市場全体における「脱中央集権的リスクヘッジ資産」としてのBTC存在感を際立たせている。

title: メタマスク、最大級のオンチェーン報酬プログラムを開始へ　独自トークンとも関連か
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレットのメタマスクが大規模報酬プログラムを予定している。シーズン1のみで45億円相当のLINEA配布を予定し、独自トークンとの連携も示唆されている。

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、BTC20万ドル到達分析や米国でXRPなどのETF個別申請が不要になど
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナといった主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: ビットコイン1700万円台後半に回復、米政府機関閉鎖で逃避資金流入｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: 今週のビットコイン円相場は1775万円周辺まで反発。米政府機関閉鎖による逃避資金流入と利下げ期待の復活が支援材料に。ドル建て12万ドル回復で史上最高値更新の可能性を解説。

title: 週刊ニュース｜自称IQ276投資家のBTCへの全財産転換やポケカ等のトークン化トレンド分析に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、自称IQ276の投資家によるビットコインへの全財産転換、米政府閉鎖による仮想通貨ETF承認手続き停滞、バイナンスによるビッグトレンド分析に関する記事が最も関心を集めた。

title: 仮想通貨強気相場を加速か？　トランプ米大統領が最大2000ドルの給付金を検討
contentSnippet: 米国のトランプ大統領が関税収入を基に最大2,000ドルの国民給付金を検討している。コロナ禍では給付金がビットコイン上昇を後押ししており仮想通貨市場への影響が注目される。

title: ビットコインマイニング大手MARA、BTC保有量が1兆円に迫る
contentSnippet: Maraが発表した9月の生産実績によると、218ブロックを獲得し前月比5%増を記録した。ビットコイン保有量は52,850BTCに達し、上場企業の中でストラテジーに次ぐ第2位の保有額。

title: ウォルマート傘下のワンペイ、仮想通貨取引機能を年内追加へ
contentSnippet: ウォルマートが過半数を所有するフィンテック企業ワンペイが年内にモバイルアプリで仮想通貨取引とカストディサービスを開始すると報じられた。
